2006-07-24

Why I started learning piano #4: Hoagy Carmichael


OK - so Hoagy isn't actually playing piano in this clip but seeing him in To Have and Have Not - chewing on his toothpick, looking cool and dealing with the sassy Lauren Bacall was another reason I took up the piano.

This clip has Hoagy rattling off a few of his classics and partaking of some uncomfartable badinage with trombonist and bandleader Jack Teagarden
